snippet.title: Alan Wake 2 – Night Springs Expansion Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2024
snippet.description:
Three episodes. Three playable characters. An endless time loop in... Night Springs.

Trapped in the enigmatic Dark Place, Alan Wake seeks an escape. As he pens the scripts for the once-beloved TV show "Night Springs," he unwittingly unravels the fabric of reality. 

Step into the surreal and experience the world of Alan Wake as never before in… Night Springs. Will you break free from the loop, or become another echo lost in the shadows? 

Night Springs, the first Alan Wake 2 expansion, is available June 8th exclusive to the Deluxe Edition.

Alan Wake 2 is available on PC on the Epic Games Store, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X|S.

Developed by Remedy Entertainment. Published by Epic Games.

Find out more at https://alanwake.com.

The Night Springs expansion trailer debuted in Summer Game Fest on 7th June 2024.

Follow Alan Wake:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/alanwake  
Facebook: https://facebook.com/alanwake  
Instagram: https://instagram.com/alanwakeofficial  

#AlanWake #AlanWake2 #NightSprings
